hopobject.name: Beagle SDR
hopobject.body: Although the beagle board can support USB2.0 high speed peripherals, the Beagle Board also has an expansion connector exposures other interfaces. This project will examine these interfaces with the goal of creating a board with an FPGA and data converters to interface the expansion connector to the USRP daughterboard interface and provide some signal processing in the FPGA.
hopobject.shortdesc: Create an interface between the Beagle Board and the GNU Radio USRP daughterboards.
